![KristinaDuggan](https://www.longbeach.gov/globalassets/district-3/media-library/images/home/kristinaduggan.jpg "KristinaDuggan") [3rd District Newsletter Sign Up](https://lp.constantcontactpages.com/su/ZrEVp7O "3rd District Newsletter") [Download Go Long Beach](https://www.longbeach.gov/ti/resources/go-long-beach-apps "Download Go Long Beach") [Council Policy Proposals](https://www.longbeach.gov/district3/councilpolicy "Council Policy Proposals") [Voice of the Third Archive](https://www.longbeach.gov/district3/about-us/voiceofthethird "Voice of the Third Archive") [District 3 Engaged Podcast](https://www.longbeach.gov/district3/about-us/district-3-engaged "District 3 Engaged Podcast") [Lights, Camera, No Action Pilot Program](https://www.longbeach.gov/district3/lights-camera-no-action "Lights, Camera, No Action Pilot Program")

## Third District

### Councilmember Kristina Duggan

Elected in November 2022 to serve the residents of the 3rd District, Kristina is driven by her passion for community service, education, public safety, and the vitality of the local business community. As a Councilmember, Kristina is working to address issues most impacting the residents of the 3rd District including issues related to public safety, homelessness, and infrastructure.

 

Kristina has been a proud resident living and working in the 3rd District of Long Beach for over 25 years. Kristina co-owns and operates Dr. Duggan &amp; Associates, a successful local behavioral health center in the Belmont Heights area of Long Beach. Currently, she and her husband, Matt, live in Belmont Shore with their daughter Shannon, who is currently attending the University of Hawaii, Manoa, and their son, Matthew, a high school junior and hockey player.

* * *

### Featured Events

* * *

### Press Releases

[Long Beach to host debut US Screening of Elliott Hasler’s British indie film, Vindication Swim, on July 11 at the Aquarium of the Pacific](https://www.longbeach.gov/district3/press-releases/long-beach-to-host-debut-us-screening-of-elliott-haslers-british-indie-film-vindication-swim-on-july-11-at-the-aquarium-of-the-pacific)

Councilmember Kristina Duggan and City of Long Beach will host the debut US screening of Elliott Hasler’s British indie film, Vindication Swim, on July 11 at the Aquarium of the Pacific. This historic screening aims to build excitement for the LA 28 Olympic Games, where Long Beach will host several aquatics events including open water swim. Follow this link to reserve your tickets.

[We Need to Advocate for Statewide Public Health and Safety Initiatives](https://www.longbeach.gov/district3/press-releases/we-need-to-advocate-for-statewide-public-health-and-safety-initiatives)

This week, I submitted a memorandum for the June 4 City Council meeting, co-authored by Councilmember Dr. Ricks-Oddie and Councilmember Zendejas, asking City Council to direct staff to report on the statewide proposals that address retail theft, drug addiction, and smash and grab crimes, and to provide recommendations on proposals the City can support.

[154 Acre Wetlands Restoration Project in Long Beach Takes Critical Step Forward](https://www.longbeach.gov/district3/press-releases/154-acre-wetlands-restoration-project-in-long-beach-takes-critical-step-forward)

Councilmember Kristina Duggan, Chair of the Los Cerritos Wetlands Authority, proudly announces the approval of a pivotal [land exchange agreement](https://scc.ca.gov/webmaster/ftp/pdf/sccbb/2024/2402/20240215Board09_LCWLandSwap.pdf "https://scc.ca.gov/webmaster/ftp/pdf/sccbb/2024/2402/20240215Board09_LCWLandSwap.pdf") by the California State Coastal Conservancy on February 15 to restore over 150 acres of coastal wetlands in Long Beach. 

[Press Release Archive »](https://www.longbeach.gov/press-release-archive/?cid=6760)

##### Councilmember **Kristina Duggan**

City Hall Office  
411 West Ocean Blvd. 11th Floor  
Long Beach, CA 90802

**Phone:** (562) 570-6300

[district3@longbeach.gov](mailto:district3@longbeach.gov)
